__e: Ryan, I know you're depressed, and you don't want to think of anyone but yourself right now, but that tainted whore needs you.
We talked for a long time, and all he kept saying was how depressed he was and how his life had no meaning.
"Now that I know that you're depressed "and you have these things, like, "I can no longer treat you with carelessness."
What you don't know is I'm upset about it.
Don't be depressed about the way luck deceived you... fortune sailed away, you missed the boat... and found you'd been left behind.
Whenever you get down about yourself, whenever you have moments of self-doubt, just look over here and say, "It could be worse. "
